metadata.title: CVE-2016-3759 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The Framework APIs in Android 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and6.x before 2016-07-01 allow attackers to read backup data via a craftedapplication that leverages priv-app access to insert a backup transport,aka internal bug 28406080.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
